name: Daily Guidance
description: Single card for daily insight, quick answers, or focused guidance

positions.label: Guidance
positions.description: Your guidance card for today or this situation

instructions: Clear your mind and focus on your question
Ask for guidance from the universe
Draw your card when you feel ready
Meditate on the card's message and symbolism

interpretation.overview: A single card draw offers focused guidance and clear direction for your day or specific question.
tips: Pay attention to your first intuitive reaction to the card
Consider both the upright and reversed meanings
Look at the imagery and colors for additional insights
Trust your intuition over memorized meanings
Keep the card's message in mind throughout your day
